issue.title: [Docs] Move release management guide to project wiki
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2802](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2802). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I have begun doing this here https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/ARROW/Release+Management+Guide. I think we should remove RELEASE_MANAGEMENT.md and add a note to dev/release/README.md to navigate to the Confluence page

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2802?focusedCommentId=16535926) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2226
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2226>
